resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a folder

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a folder

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a folder

options.name: Search
options.description: Search files

options.name: Share
options.description: Share a folder

options.name: Update
options.description: Update folder

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

fileId.name: fileId
fileId.description: The ID of the file to share
fileId.ai_hint: The ID of the file to share

parentId.name: parentId
parentId.description: ID of the folder you want to create the new folder in. if not defined it will be created on the root folder.
parentId.ai_hint: ID of the folder you want to create the new folder in. if not defined it will be created on the root folder.

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: contet_types
options.description: Limits search results to items with the given content types. Content types are defined as a comma-separated lists of Box recognized content types.

options.name: direction
options.description: Defines the direction in which search results are ordered. Default value is DESC.

options.name: fields
options.description: A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response. This can be used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response.

options.name: file_extensions
options.description: Limits search results to a comma-separated list of file extensions

options.name: ancestor_folder_ids
options.description: Limits search results to items within the given list of folders. Folders are defined as a comma-separated lists of folder IDs.

options.name: scope
options.description: Limits search results to a user scope

options.name: size_range
options.description: Limits search results to items within a given file size range. File size ranges are defined as comma-separated byte sizes.

options.name: sort
options.description: Returns the results ordered in descending order by date at which the item was last modified

options.name: trash_content
options.description: Controls if search results include the trash

options.name: owner_user_ids
options.description: Limits search results to items owned by the given list of owners. Owners are defined as a comma-separated list of user IDs.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.hint: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded

query.name: query
query.description: The string to search for. This query is matched against item names, descriptions, text content of files, and various other fields of the different item types.
query.ai_hint: The string to search for. This query is matched against item names, descriptions, text content of files, and various other fields of the different item types.

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

accessibleBy.name: accessibleBy
accessibleBy.description: The type of object the file will be shared with
accessibleBy.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

useEmail.name: useEmail
useEmail.description: Whether identify the user by email or ID

email.name: email
email.description: The user's email address to share the folder with
email.ai_hint: The user's email address to share the folder with

userId.name: userId
userId.description: The user's ID to share the folder with
userId.ai_hint: The user's ID to share the folder with

groupId.name: groupId
groupId.description: The group's ID to share the folder with
groupId.ai_hint: The group's ID to share the folder with

role.name: role

options.name: Co-Owner
options.description: A Co-owner has all of functional read/write access that an editor does

options.name: Editor
options.description: An editor has full read/write access to a folder or file

options.name: Previewer
options.description: A previewer has limited read access

options.name: Previewer Uploader
options.description: This access level is a combination of Previewer and Uploader

options.name: Uploader
options.description: An uploader has limited write access

options.name: Viewer
options.description: A viewer has read access to a folder or file

options.name: Viewer Uploader
options.description: This access level is a combination of Viewer and Uploader

role.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

options.name: options
can_view_path
options.description: Whether the invited users can see the entire parent path to the associated folder. The user will not gain privileges in any parent folder and therefore cannot see content the user is not collaborated on.

options.name: expires_at
options.description: Set the expiration date for the collaboration. At this date, the collaboration will be automatically removed from the item.

options.name: fields
options.description: A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response. This can be used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response.

options.name: notify
options.description: Whether if users should receive email notification for the action performed

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

fileName.name: fileName
fileName.description: The name the file should be saved as
fileName.ai_hint: The name the file should be saved as

binaryData.name: binaryData
binaryData.description: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field

fileContent.name: fileContent
fileContent.description: The text content of the file
fileContent.ai_hint: The text content of the file

recursive.name: recursive
recursive.description: Whether to delete a folder that is not empty by recursively deleting the folder and all of its content

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: can_non_owners_invite
options.description: Whether users who are not the owner of the folder can invite new collaborators to the folder

options.name: can_non_owners_view_collaborators
options.description: Whether to restrict collaborators who are not the owner of this folder from viewing other collaborations on this folder

options.name: description
options.description: The optional description of this folder

options.name: fields
options.description: A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response. This can be used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response.

options.name: is_collaboration_restricted_to_enterprise
options.description: Whether new invites to this folder are restricted to users within the enterprise. This does not affect existing collaborations.

options.name: name
options.description: The optional new name for this folder

options.name: parentId
options.description: The parent folder for this folder. Use this to move the folder or to restore it out of the trash.

options.name: shared_link
options.description: Share link information

options.name: Collaborators
options.description: Only those who have been invited to the folder

options.name: Company
options.description: Only people within the company

options.name: Open
options.description: Anyone with the link

options.name: password
options.description: The password required to access the shared link. Set the password to null to remove it.

options.name: can_download
options.description: Whether the shared link allows for downloading of files

options.name: unshared_at
options.description: The timestamp at which this shared link will expire

options.name: vanity_name
options.description: Defines a custom vanity name to use in the shared link URL, for example https://app.box.com/v/my-shared-link

options.name: tags
options.description: The tags for this item. These tags are shown in the Box web app and mobile apps next to an item.

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'copy' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileId'
IF operation == 'copy' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'parentId'
IF operation == 'copy' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileId'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileId'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileId'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'query'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'file' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileId'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'accessibleBy'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource == 'file' AND accessibleBy == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'useEmail'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource == 'file' AND useEmail == True AND accessibleBy == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource == 'file' AND useEmail == False AND accessibleBy == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource == 'file' AND accessibleBy == 'group' THEN SHOW parameter 'groupId'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'role'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileName'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryData'
IF binaryData == False AND operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileContent'
IF binaryData == True AND operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'parentId'
IF resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'parentId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'folderId'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'folderId'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'recursive'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'query'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'folder' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'folderId'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'accessibleBy'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource == 'folder' AND accessibleBy == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'useEmail'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource == 'folder' AND accessibleBy == 'user' AND useEmail == True THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource == 'folder' AND accessibleBy == 'user' AND useEmail == False THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource == 'folder' AND accessibleBy == 'group' THEN SHOW parameter 'groupId'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'role'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'folderId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF access == 'open' THEN SHOW parameter 'password'
